titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to develop a watershed management plan for the Lake George area of Indiana, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1192)
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: 5/10/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to develop a watershed management plan for the Deep River Basin, Indiana, which includes Deep River, Lake George, Turkey Creek, and other related tributaries in Indiana.
